finance.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the management of money by governments, large organizations etc
finance.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: leasing and other forms of business finance
the world of high finance (=financial activities involving very large amounts of money)
finance.translation[0].definitions[1].de: money provided by a bank or other institution to help buy or do something
finance.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: We need to raise finance for further research.
finance.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to provide money, especially a lot of money, to pay for something
finance.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The concerts are financed by the Arts Council.
finance.translation[2].definitions[0].de: money provided or lent, for example by a bank for INVESTMENT (=when money is put into buildings, equipment, etc to produce goods and services) or CONSUMPTION (=when people buy goods and services)
finance.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: The building society is Scotland’s biggest source of finance for house building.
The European Investment Bank would provide finance for a range of activities including regional development activity.
The next step was to obtain finance in order to start manufacturing and selling full-sized engines.
If you are selling a larger property, which is paid for, and buying a smaller one, then you will not have to raise finance (=obtain it).
finance.translation[2].definitions[1].de: the management of money by countries, organizations, and people
finance.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: The appointment of a top finance executive as vice chairman suggests that finance will play a prominent role in the company’s future.
Russia’s finance minister said he expects the ruble to stabilize soon.
finance.translation[2].definitions[2].de: the study of the management and use of money
finance.translation[2].definitions[2].ex: He is professor of finance at Wharton Business School.
finance.translation[2].definitions[3].de: the money that an organization or person has, and the way that they manage it
finance.translation[2].definitions[3].ex: Italian state finances are about the worst of any major world economy.
The television network hired McKinsey to conduct an overall strategic review of its structure, operations and finances.
finance.translation[3].definitions[0].de: to give or lend money, especially a large amount of money, to pay for something
finance.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: The new company will be financed by a total of $200 million in equity and $300 million in bank debt.
